Reaction: pyruvate + CoA + 2 oxidized ferredoxin = acetyl-CoA + CO2 + 2 reduced ferredoxin + 2 H+ [RN:R01196]
a primary alcohol + NAD+ = an aldehyde + NADH + H+ [RN:R00623]; a secondary alcohol + NAD+ = a ketone + NADH + H+ [RN:R00624]
methane + quinol + O2 = methanol + quinone + H2O [RN:R09518]
ATP + acetate + CoA = AMP + diphosphate + acetyl-CoA [RN:R00235]
